subdisciplines.name: Quantum Chromodynamics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the strong interaction between quarks and gluons.

subdisciplines.name: Electroweak Interaction
subdisciplines.description: The study of the unified theory of electromagnetism and the weak force.

subdisciplines.name: Neutrino Physics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the properties and behavior of neutrinos.

subdisciplines.name: Cosmic Rays
subdisciplines.description: The study of high-energy particles from outside the solar system.
